lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He described the present accord as a model for commodity agreements due to its being signed by nearly all producing and consuming countries and by virtue of its review systems and control over buffer stock management.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Lim, who will sign and ratify the agreement on Malaysia's behalf when he visits New York during his current tour, said it was important there should not be a long "interregnum" between the old agreement lapsing in October and the new one coming into force.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said Narjes told him there appeared no fundamental barriers to EC states quickly ratifying the new International Rubber Agreement, INRA, although translations of the accord into some EC languages are still being awaited.

lst.name: sentence
